product_name: Canari Razor Convertible Bike Jacket - Men's - 2011 Closeout
long_description: When chillly mornings turn into afternoon sun, the Canari Razor convertible bike jacket keeps you riding in comfort thanks to removable sleeves and lightweight, weather-resistant fabric. Sleeves zip off easily, pack down small and can be easily stowed in the jacket's rear zippered pocket. Lightweight polyester fends off light rain and wind while remaining breathable enough for comfort in mild weather. 2-way front zipper with draft flap allows adjustable ventilation. Droptail hem ensures full coverage while in the riding position; drawcord-adjustable hem allows a snug, secure fit to seal in warmth. Canari Razor convertible bike jacket features zippered hand pockets; reflective details enhance visibility in low light. Closeout.
